subject: Carp (Fish)
Fishing, Sport
Invasive Species
Lakes
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: Silver carp, invasive fish that leap high out of the water when disturbed by watercraft, are hunted recreationally in the Midwest waterways they infest.
snippet: Silver carp, invasive fish that leap high out of the water when disturbed by watercraft, are hunted recreationally in the Midwest waterways they infest.
